"Ah, <%me>!":
"<%me>!
I haven't seen you around lately!
You do remember me, right?"
"1. Who were you again...?"
"2. Ah, long time no see."
"Have I been straight up forgotten?!"
"That moment of silence means you don't remember!"
"It is I, Katori! Ka-to-ri! The one who spread your beloved Bouncer class, and is now regarded as a graceful and legendary maiden."
"Due to your self-assertiveness, the number of complaints you've received is certainly legendary."
"That's because you don't advertise enough. Getting them to remember is the top priority, after all."
"But, thanks to <%me> as well, the Bouncer class has seen a universal expansion."
"Inspired by your achievements, there is an increasing number of ARKS who have decided to try out various weapons and classes regardless of their preferences."
"Thanks to you, not only Bouncer, but the entire diversity of ARKS has increased."
"That, and Katori unnecessarily spread the word that you were also using the Bouncer class, spreading strange advertisements which likely contributed to it as well."
"I wasn't lying! I don't tell lies! And even if you weren't using it, you were at least aware of it."
"And even if you're not using it right now, starting today, you can begin learning how to, and then everything will be true!"
"...Well, it is certainly true that having a diverse array of combat methods will make it easy to prepare yourself for any scenario."
"Furthermore, the more individuals who have mastered them, the more easier they can work with others using them."
"I've heard that new problems are on the rise. If you ever need our assistance, call us any time."

"Fufufu, exactly what Saga is saying.
My newfound powers exist for you."
"...As you've already guessed during our talk, Katori has hardly changed and will likely cause you grief. We wish you the best, regardless."

"You're so mean, Saga!
And <%me> is too, don't just nod like that!"
